lead_paragraph: State appellate judges have heard arguments over the New York Police Department's use of a Cold War-era federal legal doctrine to deny releasing records.

headline.main: Judges Hear Challenge to NYPD Transparency in Spy Lawsuits
headline.print_headline: Judges Hear Challenge to NYPD Transparency in Spy Lawsuits

snippet: State appellate judges have heard arguments over the New York Police Department's use of a Cold War-era federal legal doctrine to deny releasing records.
